messages.message:
Hi EPD team!  As an FYI, we’ll be cleaning [deleting] up any sandboxes that have been hibernated over 30 days: This will happen on Wednesday after 6:00 pm PDT.  And, we’ll put up a nightly job to delete inactive sandboxes by end of week.

You can look at how long your sandboxes have been hibernated by visiting: https://admiral.instabase.com/sandbox

If you can actively go and delete the sandboxes that are not being used, it will be super helpful to actively reduce our costs.
